parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below scenario from application data captured 
 Scenario  : To check family floater family size 
1) Product Name : Arogya Sanjeevani 
2)Policy plan :  Family Floater 
3)Business Type : New Business
4) Member:2A+1C (Self + Spouse + Child 1)
5) Highest member Age Band : 
Self : 30 age ,SI : 3Lac
Child 1 : 10 age : SI 3 Lac
Child 2 : 10 age : SI 3 Lac
6) Trigger point:System should validate the number of members added based on Family floater Category, for eg, if it is 3A+3C, system should allow 3 adults and 3 children 
7) VP Point : system gives valiadtion Number of members risk is not matching with the family size selected
